sn45.27:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kumbho anadharo suppavattiyo hoti, sadharo duppavattiyo hoti;
sn45.27:1.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, cittam anadharam suppavattiyam hoti, sadharam duppavattiyam hoti.
sn45.27:1.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kumbho anadharo suppavattiyo hoti, sadharo duppavattiyo hoti;
sn45.27:1.9: evameva kho, bhikkhave, cittam anadharam suppavattiyam hoti, sadharam duppavattiyam hoti”ti.
